description:
Shirou and Saber are attacked by the Servant Gilgamesh. Later, Shirou decides he wants Saber to stay after the war ends.
Source: Hulu

titles.title: Der Stern der Schöpfung, der Himmel und Erde zerteilt
Déchirant Ciel et Terre, L`Etoile au commencement du monde
Tenchi Kairi Su Kaibyaku no Hoshi
The Star of Creation That Divided Heaven and Earth
ปฐมดาราที่แบ่งแยกสวรรค์และปฐพี
